ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(FS_Instalation_Process__r.FS_Execution_Plan_Final_Approval_PM__c,'Approved'), $Profile.Name != "FS AC_P", $Profile.Name != "FS PM_P", $Profile.Name != "FS Admin PM_P", $Profile.Name != "FET System Admin", $Profile.Name != "System Administrator")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Technician Instructions(IP) cannot be updated after Execution Plan has been approved. Please Contact your PM for any necessary edits.
